one.title: What is TransferGo?
one.description: TransferGo is a digital money service that aims to improve the lives of hard-working people through simpler, better financial services. It began with developing fast, cheap international money transfers, and is now spreading out its offering to remove barriers for customers, especially migrants, who need financial services.

two.title: Is TransferGo Safe?
two.description: TransferGo is closely regulated by EU and UK law. We work closely with international law enforcement to spot and prevent money laundering, and to keep our 7 million customers and their money safe. Our end-to-end encryption protects our customers’ money and data. Should a transfer ever fail, there are special safeguarding measures in place to ensure that everyone gets their money back. Of course, customers must still look out for fraud and stay safe online. As with all fraud, once the money has been sent, it’s very hard to get it back.

three.title: Can I trust TransferGo?
three.description: Millions of users around the world trust TransferGo with their money. With a rating of ‘Excellent’ from over 35,000 reviews on Trustpilot, the TransferGo app is highly recommended by customers. It also helps that TransferGo has excellent Customer Service in English and 9 other languages.

four.title: How does TransferGo work?
four.description: Years ago, TransferGo found an elegant solution to the problem of expensive international transfers. By opening bank accounts in each country we served, we could use local transfers only to receive money in the send country, and to send money in the receiving country. Local transfers at both ends allowed us to cut out almost all of the costs, and pass the savings on to our customers. That’s why TransferGo rates are famously low. Now that fintech infrastructure has grown so much, we have more transfer options now than we did then, with superfast card-to-card payments, payments to e-wallets, and even cash transfers. But whatever the format, we’re always trying to make it as affordable as we can for our customers—while ensuring the transfers are secure and on time

five.title: How to use TransferGo
five.description: It’s simple. Download the TransferGo app, register your identity, and then follow the prompts. You can download the TransferGo app for iOS, Android and Huawei from the App Store, Google Play and Huawei Gallery. You can also register online using your computer, if you prefer.

six.title: How to send money withTransferGo
six.description: The first step is your TransferGo verification: proving your identity so we can keep you and your money safe. After that, you simply choose the currency and amount that you’re sending, and the details of the person you’re sending it to. Finally, you choose how you want to pay for the transfer—and that’s how to transfer money with TransferGo!

terms.title: Website Terms of Service
terms.description: Welcome to Exactrem ('we,' 'our,' or 'us'). These Website Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of our website www.exactrem.com (the 'Website') and any services offered through it. By using our Website, you agree to these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use our Website.

list.title: Acceptance of Terms
list.description: By accessing or using our Website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. We may update these Terms from time to time, and your continued use of the Website signifies your acceptance of any changes.

list.title: Services
list.description: Exactrem operates as a Money Services Business (MSB) registered with the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada (FINTRAC). Our services include, but are not limited to, international money transfers, currency exchange, and financial transaction services.

list.title: User Responsibilities
list.description: Exactrem operates as a Money Services Business (MSB) registered with the Financial Transactions and Reports Analysis Centre of Canada (FINTRAC). Our services include, but are not limited to, international money transfers, currency exchange, and financial transaction services.

subSections.title: Eligibility:
subSections.description: You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into binding agreements to use our services.

subSections.title: Accuracy:
subSections.description: You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information as required for the use of our services

subSections.title: Account Security:
subSections.description: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

list.title: Prohibited Activities
list.description: You agree not to engage in any activities that:

subSections.description: Violate any applicable laws or regulations, including anti-money laundering and anti-terrorist financing laws
Involve the transmission of harmful, unlawful, or offensive content
Interfere with the operation or security of our Website or services
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the Website or our systems

list.title: Intellectual Property
list.description: All content, trademarks, and other intellectual property on the Website are owned by or licensed to Exactrem. You may not use, reproduce, or distribute any content from the Website without our prior written consent.

list.title: Limitation of Liability
list.description: Our Website and services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind. Exactrem is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the Website or services. Our liability is limited to the maximum extent permitted by law.

list.title: Indemnification
list.description: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Exactrem, its affiliates, and their respective officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses arising out of your use of the Website or services, or your violation of these Terms.

list.title: Governing Law
list.description: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of British Columbia and the Federal laws of Canada. Any disputes arising under these Terms shall be resolved in the courts of British Columbia.

list.title: Changes to Terms
list.description: We may update these Terms from time to time. The updated Terms will be posted on this page with an effective date. Your continued use of the Website following any changes signifies your acceptance of the revised Terms.

list.title: Contact Information
list.description: For any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at:
paragraphs: Our Nigeria office Address: 1196, Bishop Oluwole Street, Victoria Island, Lagos.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: At Exactrem, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our Website and services.

list.title: Information We Collect
list.description: We collect the following types of information:

subSections.title: Personal Information:
subSections.description: Such as your name, contact information (email, phone number), financial details, and any other information you provide for the purpose of using our services.

subSections.title: Transaction Data:
subSections.description: Details about the transactions you conduct through our services, including amounts, dates, and payment methods

subSections.title: Usage Data:
subSections.description: Information about your interaction with our Website, such as IP address, browser type, and access times.

subSections.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies:
subSections.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your experience on our Website.

list.title: How We Use Your Information
list.description: We use your information for the following purposes:

subSections.title: To Provide and Manage Services:
subSections.description: To process transactions, manage accounts, and provide customer support

subSections.title: To Improve Our Services:
subSections.description: To analyze usage patterns and improve the functionality and performance of our Website

subSections.title: To Communicate with You:
subSections.description: To send you important updates, promotional offers, and respond to your inquiries.

subSections.title: To Comply with Legal Requirements:
subSections.description: To adhere to regulations and legal obligations, including anti-money laundering and anti-terrorist financing laws.

list.title: How We Share Your Information
list.description: We may share your information with

subSections.title: Service Providers:
subSections.description: Third-party vendors who assist us in operating our Website and providing our services, subject to confidentiality agreements.

subSections.title: Regulatory Authorities:
subSections.description: As required by FINTRAC and other regulatory bodies for compliance purposes.

subSections.title: Business Transfers:
subSections.description: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of our business, your information may be transferred to the new entity.

subSections.title: Legal Requirements:
subSections.description: To comply with legal processes, enforce our policies, or protect the rights, property, or safety of Exactrem and our users.

list.title: Data Security
list.description: You may request the deletion of your personal information, subject to legal and regulatory requirements.

list.title: Your Rights
list.description: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:

subSections.title: Access and Correction:
subSections.description: You may request access to or correction of your personal information.

subSections.title: Opt-Out:
subSections.description: You may opt-out of receiving promotional communications by following the instructions provided in our emails.

subSections.title: Deletion:
subSections.description: You may request the deletion of your personal information, subject to legal and regulatory requirements.

list.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies:
list.description: Our Website uses cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze Website usage. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

list.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy:
list.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The revised Privacy Policy will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. Your continued use of the Website signifies your acceptance of the revised Privacy Policy.

list.title: Contact Information
list.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:
paragraphs: Our Nigeria office Address: 1196, Bishop Oluwole Street, Victoria Island, Lagos.

overview.description: Discover the future of person-to-person transfers with Exactrem. Sign up now and enjoy the convenience, speed, and security of our top-notch services. Connect with loved ones effortlessly and manage your financial transactions with confidence. With Exactrem, the world is at your fingertips—transferring money has never been easier.

serviceList.title: Effortless Money Transfers at Your Fingertips
serviceList.description: At Exactrem, we believe that sending money should be as easy as a text message. Our person-to-person transfer service is designed for simplicity and convenience, allowing you to send funds with just a few clicks. Whether you're supporting family overseas, splitting a bill with friends, or sending a special gift, our platform ensures a smooth and intuitive experience every time

serviceList.title: Instant Delivery
serviceList.description: Time is of the essence when transferring money to someone you care about. With Exactrem, your funds are delivered almost instantly. Say goodbye to waiting days for bank transfers and hello to real-time money movement that keeps you connected with those who matter most.

serviceList.title: Your Security is Our Priority
serviceList.description: When it comes to transferring money, trust is essential. Exactrem employs state-of-the-art encryption and security measures to protect your personal and financial information. Our robust security protocols ensure that your transactions are safe from fraud and unauthorized access, giving you peace of mind with every transfer.

serviceList.title: Reliable Transactions
serviceList.description: Count on Exactrem for reliable and consistent service. Our advanced technology and secure infrastructure ensure that your money reaches its destination quickly and without errors. Enjoy the confidence that comes with knowing your transactions are handled with the utmost precision.

serviceList.title: Connecting You Worldwide
serviceList.description: No matter where your loved ones are, Exactrem makes global transfers simple. Our extensive network spans across countries, allowing you to send money to virtually any location around the world. Experience the convenience of managing international transactions with a local touch.

serviceList.title: Localized Support
serviceList.description: We understand that dealing with international transfers can be daunting. That’s why Exactrem provides localized support to help you navigate any challenges. Our customer service team is well-versed in various regions and currencies, offering assistance tailored to your specific needs.

serviceList.title: Know What You’re Paying For
serviceList.description: With Exactrem, there are no hidden fees or unexpected charges. Our pricing is transparent, with clearly outlined fees and exchange rates. You'll know exactly how much you're paying and how much your recipient will receive, ensuring complete transparency in every transaction.

serviceList.title: Competitive Rates
serviceList.description: We strive to offer competitive rates that provide excellent value for your money. Our goal is to make person-to-person transfers affordable without compromising on quality or service. Get more for less with Exactrem’s fair pricing structure.

serviceList.title: User-Friendly Platform
serviceList.description: Exactrem’s platform is designed with you in mind. Our intuitive interface makes it easy to set up and manage transfers, track transactions, and handle your account with minimal effort. Whether you're using our mobile app or website, you’ll find our technology enhances your transfer experience.

serviceList.title: Innovative Features
serviceList.description: Stay ahead with our advanced features designed to simplify your transactions. From real-time tracking and notifications to easy recipient management, Exactrem integrates cutting-edge technology to provide a seamless and enjoyable user experience.

serviceList.title: 24/7 Assistance When You Need It
serviceList.description: We are here to support you around the clock. Exactrem’s dedicated customer support team is available 24/7 to assist with any questions or concerns. Whether you need help with a transfer, have questions about our services, or require technical support, our knowledgeable team is ready to help.

serviceList.title: Personalized Service
serviceList.description: Expect personalized and attentive service from our support staff. We take the time to understand your needs and provide solutions that meet your specific requirements. Experience exceptional customer care with Exactrem.

Enjoy the ease of sending money directly from your account to any business, anywhere in the world, with just a few clicks.

Forget about the delays associated with traditional banking methods—our cutting-edge technology guarantees fast and efficient transactions every time.

serviceList.title: Dependable Service
serviceList.description: Count on Exactrem for consistent and reliable transactions. Our platform is built with robust infrastructure to handle your payments accurately and without interruption. serviceList.title: Connecting with Business Worldwide

Know exactly what you’re paying for and how much will be deducted from your account. Our clear fee model ensures you always have full visibility into your transactions.

serviceList.title: Competitive Rates

serviceList.description: Exactrem offers advanced features designed to enhance your payment experience. From automated recurring payments to one-click processing, our platform is equipped with tools to make transactions more efficient. Manage your payments easily with features tailored to meet your needs.

serviceList.description: Stay informed with real-time tracking and notifications. Monitor the status of your payments and receive instant updates, so you’re always in the loop. Our advanced tracking ensures you have complete visibility throughout the payment process.

serviceList.title: 24/7 Assistance When You Need It

Exactrem’s dedicated customer support team is available around the clock to assist with any questions or issues. Whether you need help with a payment or have inquiries about our services, we’re here to provide prompt and professional assistance.

serviceList.title: Personalized Assistance
